attributes.additional_details:
we need cystic fibrosis to be advertised on tv.

Responsible department: Department of Health

my daughter is 4months old with cystic fibrosis, and i hope one day there will be a cure, but the only way we are going to find a cure is if people donate so that people can do much needed re-search, Cystic fibrosis needs awareness, as of the moment it hasnt got much awareness and people do not know what it is. i think with people know about this disease i believe this will raise much needed funding for the cftrust and therefore aiding the search for much needed drugs and maybe a cure one day.
many people die every year needlessly,
I would like for the schools to teach in there biology lesson about cystic fibrosis and think that teaching children about the subject will also help, they may then pass this information to parents.
what i want the government to provide  advertising for cf so itl help funding for cftrust.
as awareness is really needed.

rejection.details: Please see: cystic fibrosis to be advertised on tv and also make organ donation manatory in the uk
